Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: A rat model of IUGR was established by PCE , male fetuses and adult offspring at the age of postnatal week 24 were euthanized .

Let's think step by step.
1. IUGR (Intrauterine Growth Restriction) is the disease entity in this paragraph. It is a condition where a fetus does not grow at a normal rate in the womb.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Disease.
The disease entity in this paragraph is IUGR (Intrauterine Growth Restriction).

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
